channel.title: A11y on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in A11y on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Writing for Every Reader
item.description: I recently spoke at #a11yTOConf, a conference by the organizers of the regular a11yTO meet-up. The organizers put together a great line up of speakers. It was the first #a11yTOConf but I hope it won’t be the last! Here are my slides for Writing for Every Reader. Resources I mentioned: Hemingway App, the app that helps improve the readability of your content. BeeLine Reader, the browser plugin for dyslexics.
